thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and Comfortable
thread.title_full: Clean and Comfortable - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joyce3909
title: Clean and Comfortable
text: This was my second stay at this hotel, and again, I was very pleased. Although there was a line to check in when I arrived, I was made to feel welcome. My room was small but clean, and on the back side of the hotel as I had requested (quieter). The bed was super comfortable. I was on the 5th floor, which meant I could easily take the stairs if the elevators were slow (a frequent problem). I appreciated the friendly staff and the convenient location. I will be back for sure!
